data.app_name: Ambulance Rush - Ambulance Driving & Rescue Simulator
data.description:
This Ambulance Rush game puts you in the driver's seat of a high-speed ambulance, racing against time in this action-packed simulator as you navigate through bustling city streets, crowded parks, chaotic construction zones, busy highways and much more diverse locations to save lives. Each level presents unique and challenging emergency scenarios, from a heart attack victim at a family picnic to a construction worker injured by falling debris.

In this game, you'll perform realistic first aid tasks such as stabilizing fractures, administering pain relief, and providing wound care, all while ensuring a safe and smooth transport to the hospital. Immerse yourself in the detailed and dynamic environments, with stunning graphics and realistic sound effects that bring each rescue mission to life. Use sirens and horns strategically to clear your path and reach victims as quickly as possible. 

Choose between two exciting modes: Free Mode, where you can explore the city and complete rescues at your own pace without a time limit, and Time Attack Mode, where every second counts, and you must race against the clock to save lives. Both modes offer an exciting experience with their unique challenges. 

Ambulance Rush offers a thrilling and immersive experience for fans of simulation games, driving games, and emergency response scenarios. Take on the challenge and master the art of emergency rescue!
